reviews.review:
Это портал! Что говорить об этой игре? Все и так знают, что эта игра из себя представляет - трёхмерная головоломка с очень интересным сюжетом. 
Если же вы думаете - покупать эту игру или нет, то ответ короткий и ясный - Да, берите эту игру. Вы не пожалеете. Советую так же купить первую часть сие шедевра.
The Cake was not a lie in this game !!!!!!
Very fun puzzle game, it eventually gets very hard as you progress but still an enjoyable experience
好
It shows how to make game
Эту игра ахуенна. Всем советую. Игра классна персами, и саундом. Всо, пока.(пойду ее переигрывать)
Played it on the Xbox360 and liked it. Bought on PC for the workshop test chambers.

There's so little wrong with this game that I'm not sure if there's anything to really complain about.

Pros:
+Humor is on-point.
+Puzzles are intuitive as ever yet can be challenging.
+The story is very interesting.
+GLaDOS, Wheatley, and Cave Johnson are perfectly written and acted.

Cons:
-One puzzle was a little misleading. Only one.

Portal 2 takes the blank slate of its predecessor to create a game as close to perfection as it gets.

The true masterpiece of a game, incredible in it's every aspect. For me it is one of the best games of all times. I haven't played it since it came out, just finished it few days ago and realized why I loved it so much. Puzzles are creative and challenging while maintaining the learning curve well adjusted. Portal mechanics is perfect in itself and the new gel mechanics just added more flavor. The story is amazing and I loved learning more about Portal Universe and evolution of Aperture. World-building and storytelling are both top notch, smartly written and visually told in best way possible.
The art is on the same level as the mechanics and story - every element is conceived with so much attention and love from concepts to renders and textures. The level design is visually beautiful, well designed and tells a story. Music is epic, voice-overs too... I don't think there is anything negative that I could say about this game.... 
This game is worth every cent and it is a bargain even if you pay full price, but you can find it for less the 1$ on discount. 

p.s. Have in mind that beside single-player and multiplayer and level creator, you can download a mod called - Portal Stories : Mel, and it's really good especially if you need more portal universe after finishing portal 2. 

10 / 10

Definition of a great sequel. Took what was great about the first Portal and multiplied it by ten. Great game if you want to get into pc gaming as you can practically run this game on almost any type of hardware.

Oyun çıkalı, yanlış bilmiyorsam 8 yıl oldu ve halen hikayesi sarıyor.
Oyunun atmosferi kesinlikle çok güzel.  karakterinizin konuşmaması sizin karakter ile özdeşleşmenizi sağlıyor. Diyaloglar harika. Bulmacalar başta kolay gelse de sonraları inanılmaz zorlaşıyor.  Grafikler 8 sene öncesinin oyunu için çok iyi düzeyde. Source motorunun nimetlerini görmüş oluyoruz.
Ayrıca mükemmel şekilde half life' a yapılan göndermeler var. 
İndirimde iken kaçırmadan alın.

Everyone knows its great, its something every pc gamer worth their salt should play. It's also, thankfully, one of the few games that knows when it's done. No shitty recurring quests, randomly generated content, or cheap newgame+. It has a story to tell alongside fun gameplay, and that's it. It knows it doesn't need to have infinite playtime to be good.

The mechanics are kicked up a notch here and the play time is at least twice as long as the original game.  Although everyone loves to quote the characters, I found myself turning off the dialogue as it was felt nagging and redundant after a while.  The environments are already bleak enough and I don't need robots telling me how awful at the game I am!  Compare to a classic like Super Mario 64 that gets by with minimal dialogue and text (although those are available if the player seeks them out), which I think translates better internationally and holds up well over time.  I like the first game better for how concise it is although they're both really nice, puzzling and have some of the funnest physics of any games ever.

Good example for a perfect game.

I know, if cant beat the game, it is my fault, not something that does not work inside the game, frustrating faults, strange design decisions, unprecise controls etc.

Je ne pourrai qualifier ce jeu qui m' a vraiment marqué, encore plus qu le premier volet .
La musique, la mécanique de jeu, et le scénario le propulse dans mon "must-have" des jeux PC . 
La partie en multijoueur coop était très agréable . Les casses-tête peuvent paraître un peu complexes mais on comprend aisément la mécanique avec le temps . Je ne vois aucune répétition . J'espère que Valve cassera le mythe du nombre 3 pour créer une suite à cette licence incroyable ! 
Revue détaillée:
B.O:Très bonne. Graphismes : bons Scénario : impeccable.
J'espère avoir été un minimum constructif malgré mon énorme parti pris . Merci d'avoir lu .

its portal but 2

This game is just... amazing. I got into it just this year with the bundle featuring both games in the series, and I can already say it's the best game I've ever played on Steam. The storyline, the gameplay, the characters, it's all beautifully made. I especially love the soundtrack, such a cool mechanical and electronic feeling to it that makes it really stand out from other games. It's also got surprisingly decent graphics for a game made in 2011, to be completely honest, bump-mapping goes a long way there. Another thing that's great is that even thought it may be a bit short, there's plenty of community content out there to keep you entertained long after finishing the singleplayer campaign. 10/10, I've recommended it to so many people and I can't wait for the next game to come... Eventually. I'm still holding out hope, Valve, don't disappoint the fans!
